## getCommaConditionAfterItem() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns the condition in which a trailing comma is necessary after a given item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getCommaConditionAfterItem(item: MappingTemplateItem): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

item


</td><td>

[MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

"true" if a trailing comma is always necessary, "false" if a trailing comma is never necessary.
